headline: The Progressive Corporation (PGR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Progressive Corporation (PGR) on Substack by Charly AI. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PGR. The Progressive Corporation (PGR)’s share was trading at $260.38 as of April 8th. PGR’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.08 and 17.45 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
